0.1.0.name: connect20/Sttl_Preorder
0.1.0.description: Silver Preorder extension allow functionality to administrator can encourage customers to buy products that are for any reason unavailable for immediate delivery. The extension offers an easy way to inform your customers about the item status and expected arrivals time, etc. Administrator can analyze customer's demands. Administrator can set pre order notes for  customers.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
